Uses of Package
ball.mail.internet

  • Packages that use ball.mail.internet 
    Package Description
    ball.mail.internet
    Provides javax.mail implementation and utility classes specific to Internet mail systems.
    ball.mail.qmail
    Provides QMail Maildir Store implementation.
  • Classes in ball.mail.internet used by ball.mail.internet 
    Class and Description
    InternetHeadersImpl
    InternetHeaders implementation.
    MessageIDFormat
    "Message-ID" Format implementation.
    MimeMessageImpl
    Extends MimeMessage by overriding the MimeMessage.updateHeaders() method to not modify the "Message-ID".
    MimeMultipartImpl
    MimeMultipart implementation base class.
    MimeMultipartRelated
    MIME "multipart/related" implementation.
    ReadMostlyMimeMessage
    Extends MimeMessageImpl to create a "read-mostly" message.
  • Classes in ball.mail.internet used by ball.mail.qmail 
    Class and Description
    MimeMessageImpl
    Extends MimeMessage by overriding the MimeMessage.updateHeaders() method to not modify the "Message-ID".
    ReadMostlyMimeMessage
    Extends MimeMessageImpl to create a "read-mostly" message.
    ReadOnlyMimeMessage
    Extends MimeMessageImpl to create a "read-only" message.
